params._peronioV1Address: The address of the old PE contract
params._peronioV2Address: The address of the new PE contract

params.amount: The number of PE tokens to withdraw from the old contract

returns.pe: The number of PE tokens minted on the new contract
returns.usdc: The number of USDC tokens withdrawn from the old contract

params.amount: The number of PE tokens to withdraw from the old contract

returns.pe: The number of PE tokens to mint on the new contract
returns.usdc: The number of USDC tokens to withdraw from the old contract

returns._0: Whether the provided interface ID is supported

migrate(uint256).notice: Migrate the given number of PE tokens from the old contract to the new one

quote(uint256).notice: Retrieve the number of USDC tokens to withdraw from the old contract, and the number of OE tokens to mint on the new one
